website_summaries.verdict: Futuristic set that's comfortable, versatile, and offers protection from the sun.
pros: Wow guests with furniture that functions like a puzzle
Set includes a day bed, canopy, coffee table, two ottomans, and 6 pillows that fit together in a circle or can be separated
Canopy protects those sitting under it from hot sun, falling leaves or light rain
cons: Some say the cushions slip off too easily
One customer fixed this issue by placing shelf liner under the cushions

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this daybed for 13 months and although I ordered the suggested heavy duty tarp recommended on Amazon, the cushions turned moldy and unsightly from the condensation under the daybed. NO support from Modaway customer service. They referred me to custom cushion companies to replace the cushions. I feel completely mislead and disappointed. This was the largest purchase I have ever made for our new home. It’s going in the garbage. Now I have to spend more money to repair the rotted part of my lawn that’s it’s been sitting on. I’m so very upset.
customer_reviews.author: robin mayer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: After a year of sitting in my covered terrace the metal parts are rusting and the shocks are junk.fabric is holding up ok
customer_reviews.author: Andy Martin

customer_reviews.title: We Really LOVE this New Patio Set! So Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love our this patio set! It shipped over SUPER quick and was very easy to assemble! The quality is great, the versatility is so cool and my husband and I spend tons of time out on our deck now! Love this piece! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Velcro!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Cushions are well made along with the base. But does the seller read the reviews,everyone complains about the cushions sliding. Every reviews complains about it and comment on how they had to add Velcro. I'm sure the would sell many more if the Velcro was added
customer_reviews.author: Kinou9760

customer_reviews.title: Transformed our patio into a resort.
customer_reviews.text: This Daybed has transformed our pool/patio area into a Resort. Now we can "Staycation". The pop up canvas sunshield works perfectly.I'm not sure how long the white cushions will stay white, because everyone is crawling all over it, but the quality of the fabric is good. The daybed units can be moved around for separate seating to accommodate a large group of visitors. Some of the cushions can be taken off to create a table area to put food trays on. It is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: S&L Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I purchased 6 of this beds. In 2018 and 2019. Unfortunately everything is rusted , the fabric is molded and damaged by sun and the company does not provide parts for it or a replacement. Very disappointed.. I was hoping that this is a high quality but unfortunately it was good only for few months.
customer_reviews.author: iw

customer_reviews.title: This was lightweight and easy to bring to the rooftop terrace
customer_reviews.text: This was lightweight and easy to bring to the rooftop terrace ! It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and very comfortable. Tarp had a section that was not sewn together properly on the end other than that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks, opens and wears well. Only problem is the slipping of the cushions. Haven't solved that yet. Bought some serious, industrial strength velcro, fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Gail S Rose

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love this daybed! I love that it didn't require any assembly like some of the others I saw online. I was also able to find a cover that fits perfectly. WJ eTrade Patio Furniture Set Cover Round 96" Diax32 H Waterproof UV Resistant Cover Fits 5-7 Piece Large-Medium Dining Set. Another reviewer had mentioned that the cushions don't "stick" to the rattan and suggested using kitchen drawer/shelf liner which I did and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hale

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous, a good size and great quality. I would have given five stars but there is no way of securing the cushions!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. Fits the backyard space I need it to and is comfortable. My neighbors have even complimented on how nice it is. I'm super happy I went with this one. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We use it everyday and cover it up every night. Beautiful!! Dogs love it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This piece is beautiful and looks like it does in the photo
customer_reviews.text: This piece is beautiful and looks like it does in the photo. I would buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love the daybed
customer_reviews.text: Love the daybed! Great quality construction and easy to put together. Delivery was fast and packaging was great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole christensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect place to lounge and visit outside
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves our new daybed. We spend more time outside because of it; taking naps and watching the clouds go by. Remember to get a weather cover for your daybed!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Pitcole

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Delivery company is horrible! Paid for setup and move to room if choice. Dropped outside and refused to bring in. Refused to remove massive box.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece!! The only downfall is theres nothing attaching the cushions from sliding off other than that its amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love sitting in this fabulous new area at the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Very comfortable. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DeWitt Family

customer_reviews.title: Bold statement for summer lounging
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is rearranged every day by my kids. Very comfortable, but we had to add more throw cushions and a body pillow to maximize the lounge effect!
customer_reviews.author: James Hawreliak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to our patio. Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Robert Woodward

customer_reviews.title: really nice Outdoor daybed
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast, really nice Outdoor daybed. Really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The company's response was that the cushions could ...
customer_reviews.text: This furniture was a big purchase for my family. The first time the cushions got wet they poured water for four days. Then I began to store them indoors. After using the furniture only three times the faux wicker was already damaged. Disappointed. The company's response was that the cushions could hold water up to three days and that the faux wicker was wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: HRae

customer_reviews.title: Cushions/ wicker will not stay on, customer service suggested ...
customer_reviews.text: Cushions/ wicker will not stay on, customer service suggested Velcro, why not send with product if it helps? will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brad

product_meta.title: Modway Quest Circular Outdoor Wicker Rattan Patio Daybed with Canopy in Espresso Orange
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso OrangeComplete your circle with four distinct wedges of joy. Quest pieces together the puzzle of experience with a fun and versatile daybed. Adjourn for your daytime repast either by yourself or with others. Like offering a friend a warm slice of pie, Quest's pieces easily separate to serve the seating needs of others. The set also comes equipped with a sun canopy to shield your leisure time with the pleasantness of shade. Courageously engaging, this is a daybed that reveals the hidden art of collaboration and communal engagement. Quest is comprised of a UV resistant rattan base, a powder-coated aluminum frame and all-weather cushions. The set is perfect for cafes, restaurants, pool areas, hotels, resorts and other outdoor spaces.
feature_bullets: PATIO REFRESH - Update your backyard or porch with inviting outdoor furniture. Effortlessly accommodate the needs of your outdoor space with furniture that's great for both entertaining and relaxing
WEATHER-RESISTANT - Featuring a powder-coated aluminum frame and espresso brown synthetic rattan weave, this patio canopy sectional daybed is complete with UV protection for years of outdoor use
CONTEMPORARY STYLE - Clean lines and a sleek profile enhance the modern style of this outdoor daybed that boasts endless configurations. The collapsible canopy makes a great shaded seat or sunny spot
DURABLE UPHOLSTERY - Indulge in good weather while enjoying reliable comfort. Fade and water resistant, the supportive cushions feature all-weather, machine washable fabric covers for easy upkeep
DAYBED MEASUREMENTS - Perfect for the porch, backyard, garden, or poolside, this patio collection makes the most out of your outdoor area. Product Dimensions: 86.5"L x 86.5"W x 31.5"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
